channel.title: Posts on Sketching with Hardware
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sketching with Hardware

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to my Documentation of the course “Sketching with Hardware”! My name is Jeremy Gopp and I’m currently in my 7th Semester of studying Mediainformatics at the Ulm University. I chose this course to broaden my horizons, as I only worked with software in the past and getting to know the hardware side of things might be beneficial to me and also it seems like it will be fun!
